titles.title: EDA Elimination Act of 2011
A bill to terminate the Economic Development Administration, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 11/15/2011--Introduced. EDA Elimination Act of 2011 - Terminates the Economic Development Administration (EDA). Repeals the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965. Direct the Secretary of Commerce to take such actions as necessary to conclude the outstanding affairs of the EDA, including dispositions of personnel, assets, and obligations.
